sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { BuildingOfficeIcon, MagnifyingGlassIcon, PlusIcon, PencilIcon, TrashIcon, EyeIcon, FunnelIcon, PhoneIcon, EnvelopeIcon, MapPinIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const CRMDashboard: React.FC = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [filterStatus, setFilterStatus] = useState('all'); const [showCreateModal, setShowCreateModal] = useState(false); const [selectedClient, setSelectedClient] = useState(null); // Mock client data - converted to state so it can be updated const [clients, setClients] = useState([ { id: 1, name: 'ABC Transport LLC', industry: 'Transportation', website: 'www.abctransport.com', phone: '(555) 123-4567', email: 'contact@abctransport.com', address: '123 Main St, Chicago, IL 60601', status: 'active', company_size: '50-100', annual_revenue: '$5M-$10M', created_at: '2024-01-15', last_contact: '2024-01-20' }, { id: 2, name: 'XYZ Logistics Inc', industry: 'Logistics', website: 'www.xyzlogistics.com', phone: '(555) 987-6543', email: 'info@xyzlogistics.com', address: '456 Oak Ave, Houston, TX 77001', status: 'active', company_size: '100-500', annual_revenue: '$10M-$25M', created_at: '2024-01-10', last_contact: '2024-01-18' }, { id: 3, name: 'DEF Trucking Co', industry: 'Transportation', website: 'www.deftrucking.com', phone: '(555) 456-7890', email: 'sales@deftrucking.com', address: '789 Industrial Way, Austin, TX 73301', status: 'prospect', company_size: '10-50', annual_revenue: '$1M-$5M', created_at: '2024-01-08', last_contact: '2024-01-15' }, { id: 4, name: 'GHI Freight Services', industry: 'Freight', website: 'www.ghifreight.com', phone: '(555) 321-0987', email: 'sales@ghifreight.com', address: '321 Elm St, Denver, CO 80201', status: 'active', company_size: '25-50', annual_revenue: '$2M-$5M', created_at: '2024-01-05', last_contact: '2024-01-12' }, { id: 5, name: 'JKL Shipping Corp', industry: 'Shipping', website: 'www.jklshipping.com', phone: '(555) 654-3210', email: 'contact@jklshipping.com', address: '654 Maple Ave, Seattle, WA 98101', status: 'inactive', company_size: '100-500', annual_revenue: '$5M-$10M', created_at: '2023-12-20', last_contact: '2023-12-28' } ]); const handleCreateClient = async (clientData: any) => { const newClient = { ...clientData, id: Math.max(...clients.map(c => c.id)) + 1, created_at: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0], last_contact: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0] }; setClients([...clients, newClient]); setShowCreateModal(false); }; const handleDeleteClient = (id: number) => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this client?')) { setClients(clients.filter(client => client.id !== id)); } }; const filteredClients = clients .filter(client => { const matchesSearch = client.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || client.industry.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || client.email.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()); const matchesStatus = filterStatus === 'all' || client.status === filterStatus; return matchesSearch && matchesStatus; }) .sort((a, b) => a.name.localeCompare(b.name)); const getStatusColor = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case 'active': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'prospect': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; case 'inactive': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; return (
{/* Page Header */}

Client Management

Manage your client relationships and company information

{/* Search and Filters */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{/* Client List */}

Clients ({filteredClients.length})

A list of all your clients and their information

{filteredClients.map((client) => ( ))}
Company Industry Contact Info Status Size Last Contact Actions
{client.name}
{client.website}
{client.industry}
{client.email}
{client.phone}
{client.status} {client.company_size} {new Date(client.last_contact).toLocaleDateString()}

No clients found

{searchTerm || filterStatus !== 'all' ? 'Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.' : 'Get started by adding your first client.' }

{(!searchTerm && filterStatus === 'all') && (
)}
)}
{/* Create Client Modal */} {showCreateModal && (

Add New Client

{ e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(e.target as HTMLFormElement); const clientData = { name: formData.get('name'), industry: formData.get('industry'), website: formData.get('website'), phone: formData.get('phone'), email: formData.get('email'), address: formData.get('address'), status: formData.get('status'), company_size: formData.get('company_size'), annual_revenue: formData.get('annual_revenue') }; handleCreateClient(clientData); }}>
)}
); }; export default CRMDashboard;
